app.backupRestoreConfirm: If the target container for snapshot restoration does not exist, it will be created and data will be restored. Otherwise, only the data within the existing container will be overwritten. Please ensure the Docker version is consistent before restoring. Confirm?
app.createMessageNoBridgeNetworkMustHasU: A custom network must be specified when not joining the Bridge network.
app.createNetworkDesc: When bound to the host network, Docker networks cannot be bound. Please use the host IP or 127.0.0.1 directly to access container ports.

app.listManagePruneTip: Pruning will delete all stopped containers. This operation is irreversible. Confirm?
app.recycleRestoreConfirm: Restore the currently deleted container. Confirm?

components.appCompose.createYamlDisableE: Remote URLs cannot be edited directly. Please add an override yaml file.

Use panel to pull image (requires registry mirror configuration)?

Volumes not mounted from directories declared in the image and automatically created by Docker.

components.appCompose.managerStatusDangl: Cannot find the yaml file for this task. Please add a {name} directory in the panel's /dpanel/compose directory and place a compose.yaml file inside it.
components.appCron.cronContainerEntryShe: Select the script execution environment. The script will be nested within the -c parameter of sh or bash in the container.
components.appCron.cronFormContainerName: Executes in the DPanel container by default, supporting Docker commands. Ensure the selected container contains all commands required by your script.
components.appCron.cronFormEnableRunBloc: Wait for the current task execution to complete before initiating the next task.
components.appCron.cronUnitTipOption.pre: Execute every {dayOfMonth} days at {hours}:{minutes}, starting from the 1st of the month.
Execute every {hours} hours and {minutes} minutes, starting from 00:00 daily.
Execute every {minutes} minutes, starting from 00:00 daily.
Execute every {seconds} seconds, starting from 00:00 daily.
Execute at minute {minutes} of every hour
Execute on day {dayOfMonth} at {hours}:{minutes} each month
components.appCron.templateRunInDPanel: This command must run in the DPanel container

Import snapshot package (.snapshot files only, generated via container snapshot)

During snapshot restoration, only container data is restored if target container exists.
This operation may take significant time. Check snapshot results in the snapshot list.
components.appDetail.copyConfirmTip: By default, copied container has identical configuration and may not start. Enable [Bind Random Ports] for normal operation.
components.appDetail.deleteConfirmTip: Volumes not mounted from directories declared in image, automatically created by Docker
components.appDetail.exportConfirm: Export container filesystem (excluding mounted directory data). Confirm?
components.appDetail.rollbackTip: Rollback only restores container configuration. Use container snapshot for full configuration and data recovery. Select rollback date:
components.appDetail.tagFormEnableShowGr: Display as grouped card on homepage
components.appDetail.tagFormIconEmpty: Must start with https or http. Uploaded images take priority.
components.appDetail.upgradeConfirm: Batch upgrade selected containers? This will re-pull images and recreate containers. Confirm?
components.appDomain.certFormCertServerT: Try changing issuing service if application fails
components.appDomain.certFormDebugTip: Show detailed error information for troubleshooting
components.appDomain.certFormDnsApiTip: Supports server nginx and DNS API domain verification
components.appDomain.certFormRenewTip: System usually auto-renews. Enable to force renewal.
components.appDomain.certFormSslCrtConte: 1. Certificates usually have .crt or .pem extension. 2. Format begins with '-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----' and ends with '-----END CERTIFICATE-----'. 3. Include full certificate chain.
components.appDomain.certFormSslKeyConte: 1. Private keys usually have .key or .pem extension. 2. Format begins with '-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----' and ends with '-----END PRIVATE KEY-----'.
components.appDomain.createFormPortEmpty: Port to forward to target, default 80
components.appDomain.createFormProtocolT: Target can be IP, domain, container name, or container IP
components.appDomain.createFormServerNam: Configure domain aliases, shares certificate with primary domain
Specify domain to bind and resolve to current server
components.appDomain.createVhostTip: Modify vhost.conf carefully. Incorrect configuration may prevent nginx from starting after panel container restart
components.appForm.createAddHostTip: Associate host and host network hosts to container's hosts file
components.appForm.createAdvRestartDelay: Wait time before restarting to avoid frequent restarts
components.appForm.createAdvRestartWindo: Used to determine if restart attempts should continue
components.appForm.createAdvRunCommandHo: Shares host PID namespace. Use with caution.
components.appForm.createAdvRunCommandPr: Container will have root privileges. Use with caution.
components.appForm.createCapOption.audit: Enable/disable kernel audit; change audit filter rules; retrieve audit status.
Write records to kernel audit log.
components.appForm.createCapOption.block: Use features that can block system suspend.
components.appForm.createCapOption.chown: Change file owner and group (see chown(2)).
components.appForm.createCapOption.dac_o: Bypass file read, write, and execute permission checks.
components.appForm.createCapOption.dac_r: Bypass file read permission and directory read/execute permission checks.
components.appForm.createCapOption.fowne: Bypass permission checks for operations requiring process filesystem UID to match file UID.
components.appForm.createCapOption.fseti: Don't clear set-user-ID and set-group-ID permission bits when modifying files.
components.appForm.createCapOption.ipc_o: Bypass permission checks for System V IPC object operations.
components.appForm.createCapOption.kill: Bypass permission checks for sending signals.
components.appForm.createCapOption.lease: Establish leases on arbitrary files (see fcntl(2)).
components.appForm.createCapOption.linux: Set FS_APPEND_FL and FS_IMMUTABLE_FL i-node flags.
components.appForm.createCapOption.mac_a: Allow MAC configuration or changes. Implemented in Smack LSM.
components.appForm.createCapOption.mac_o: Bypass Mandatory Access Control (MAC). Implemented in Smack LSM.
components.appForm.createCapOption.net_b: Bind to Internet domain privileged ports (port number < 1024).
Make socket broadcasts, and listen to multicasts.
components.appForm.createCapOption.setgi: Manipulate process GID and supplementary GID list arbitrarily.
components.appForm.createCapOption.sys_a: Perform a range of system administration operations.
components.appForm.createCapOption.sys_b: Use reboot(2) and kexec_load(2) to restart and load new kernel.
components.appForm.createCapOption.sys_c: Use chroot(2) to change root directory.
components.appForm.createCapOption.sys_n: Raise process nice value, change arbitrary process priority.
components.appForm.createCapOption.sys_r: Perform I/O port operations (iopl(2) and ioperm(2)).
components.appForm.createCapOption.sys_t: Set system clock and real-time clock.
Use vhangup(2); perform privileged ioctl(2) operations on virtual terminals.
components.appForm.createCapOption.wake_: Trigger events that will wake up the system.
components.appForm.createCmdUser: Run as user ID and group ID
components.appForm.createCmdUserChangeTi: Create mount directories and ensure permissions when configuring run user
components.appForm.createDnsTip: Specify DNS addresses, e.g., 8.8.8.8, one per line
components.appForm.createEnvFormListInEn: Variable exists in .env file. Modifications sync to .env file. Delete via file editing.
components.appForm.createGpusDeviceEmpty: Specify device IDs or UUIDs. Leave empty for all devices.
